paradox: DIY has higher pointer zone but lower improvement
root_causes: DIY's higher same-as-last rate (18.6% vs 18.2%) creates patterns easily learned without explicit pointer.
Geolife users visit more unique locations (47.0 vs 29.8), making pointer's copy mechanism more valuable.
key_insight: The pointer mechanism helps most when patterns are COMPLEX and user-specific, not when targets are simply 'rare' in global distribution

geolife_characteristics.prediction_challenge: Complex - generation head cannot memorize user preferences
geolife_characteristics.pointer_value: HIGH - copying from history captures user-specific patterns

diy_characteristics.pointer_value: LOW - MHSA already captures simple patterns effectively
